Verses: 1 pinbu Mose, Isravelin Moopparkooda Irukkaiyil, Janangalai Nokki: Naan Indru Ungalukku Vidhikkira Kattalaigalaiyellaam Kaikkollungal.
2 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalukkuk Kodukkum Dhesaththirku Nee Poga Yordhaanaik Kadakkum Naalil, Nee Periyakallugalai Naatti, Avaigalukkuch Saandhu Poosi,

3 un Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sonnabadi Unakkuk Kodukkum Paalum Thenum Odugira Dhesaththirkul Piravesikkumbadi Nee Kadandhuponapinbu, Indha Niyaayappiramaana Vaarththaigal Yaavaiyum Avaigalil Ezhudhakkadavaai.
4 melum Neengal Yordhaanaik Kadandhapodhu, Indru Naan Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyittapadi Andhak Kallugalai Epaalmalaiyile Naatti, Avaigalukkuch Saandhu Poosi,
5 ange Iruppaayudhampadaadha Karkalaale Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Oru Balibeedaththaik Kattakkadavaai.
6 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Balibeedaththai Muzhukkarkalaale Katti, Adhinmel Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkuch Sarvaanga Dhaganabaligalaiyum,
7 samaadhaanabaligalaiyum Ittu, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sandhadhiyil Pusiththuch Sandhoshamaayirundhu,
8 andhak Kallugalil Indha Niyaayappiramaanaththin Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Thulakkamaai Ezhudhakkadavaai Endru Kattalaiyittaan.
9 pinnum Mose, Leviyaraagiya Aasaariyargalumkooda Irukkaiyil, Isravelar Ellaaraiyum Nokki: Isravele, Gavaniththuk Kel; Innaalile Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Janamaanaai.

10 aagaiyaal Nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Saththaththirkuk Keezhppadindhu, Indru Naan Unakku Vidhikkira Avarudaiya Karpanaigalinbadiyum Avarudaiya Kattalaigalinbadiyum Seyvaayaaga Endru Sonnaan.
11 melum Annaalile Mose Janangalai Nokki:
12 neengal Yordhaanaik Kadandhapinbu, Janangal Aaseervadhikkappadumbadi Keriseem Malaiyil Simiyon, Levi, Yoodhaa, Isakkaar, Yoseppu, Penyameen Ennum Koththirangal Nirkavendum.
13 saabangoorappadumporuttu Epaalmalaiyil Roopan, Kaadh, Aaser, Sepulon, Thaan, Napthali Ennum Koththirangal Nirkavendum.
14 appozhudhu Leviyar Uraththa Saththamittu Isravel Manidhar Ellaaraiyum Paarththu:

15 karththarukku Aruvaruppaana Kaariyamaagiya Thozhilaaligaludaiya Kaivelaiyaal Seyyappattadhum Vaarppikkappattadhumaana Yaadhoru Vikkiragaththai Undupanni Olippidaththile Vaikkiravan Sabikkappattavan Enbaargalaaga; Adharku Janangalellaarum Piradhiyuththaramaaga Aamen Endru Sollakkadavargal.
16 than Thagappanaiyum Than Thaayaiyum Dhooshikkiravan Sabikkappattavan Enbaargal; Janangalellaarum Aamen Endru Sollakkadavargal.
17 piranudaiya Ellaikkuriyai Otrippodugiravan Sabikkappattavan Enbaargalaaga; Janangalellaarum Aamen Endru Sollakkadavargal.
18 kurutanai Vazhidhappachcheykiravan Sabikkappattavan Enbaargalaaga; Janangalellaarum Aamen Endru Sollakkadavargal.
19 paradhesi Thikkatravan Vidhavai Aagiya Ivargaludaiya Niyaayaththaip Purattugiravan Sabikkappatavan Enbaargalaaga; Janangalellaarum Aamen Endru Sollakkadavargal.
20 than Thagappan Manaiviyode Sayanikkiravan, Than Thagappanudaiya Maanaththaith Thirandhabadiyinaale, Sabikkappattavan Enbaargalaaga; Janangalellaarum Aamen Endru Sollakkadavargal.
21 yaadhoru Mirugaththode Punarchsicheygiravan Sabikkappattavan Enbaargalaaga; Janangalellaarum Aamen Endru Sollakkadavargal.
22 than Thagappanukkaavadhu Thaaikkaavadhu Kumaaraththiyaagiya Than Sagodhariyode Sayanikkiravan Sabikkappattavan Enbaargalaaga; Janangalellaarum Aamen Endru Sollakkadavargal.
23 than Maamiyode Sayanikkiravan Sabikkappattavan Enbaargalaaga; Janangalellaarum Aamen Endru Sollakkadavargal.
24 olippidaththile Piranaik Kolaiseygiravan Sabikkappattavan Enbaargalaaga; Janangalellaarum Aamen Endru Sollakkadavargal.
25 kutramillaadhavanaik Kolaiseyyumbadi Paridhaanam Vaangugiravan Sabikkappattavan Enbaargalaaga; Janangalellaarum Aamen Endru Sollakkadavargal.
26 indha Niyaayappiramaana Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Kaikkondu Nadavaadhavan Sabikkappattavan Enbaargalaaga; Janangalellaarum Aamen Endru Sollakkadavargal.
